attributes.action: introduce legislation to require water companies to refund all surface water drainage charges back to customers where they have a soakaway for the drainage of surface water.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, according to OFWATs own rules, water companies only have to refund surface wather drainage charges (SWDC) to the beginning of the financial year, which could be as little as one month or upto a maximum of year.

This petition is asking the Prime Minister to introduce legislation to require all water companies to refund all SWDC back to the householder to the date the householder moved into the property or the soakaway was installed whichever is later.
